summary: A command‑line script that loads the Pubmed citation graph, constructs a GeniePath (or GeniePathLazy) graph neural network, trains it with PyTorch optimizers, and reports node classification accuracy.
business_intent: Showcase and benchmark a state‑of‑the‑art GNN model for semi‑supervised node classification on a real‑world citation dataset, helping developers and researchers evaluate graph learning approaches.
